scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix e2e
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --prefix backend && npm run test:coverage --prefix frontend
scripts.test:load: npm run test:load --prefix backend && npm run test:load --prefix e2e
scripts.test:performance: npm run test:performance --prefix backend && npm run test:performance --prefix frontend && npm run test:performance --prefix e2e
scripts.test:security: npm run test:security:all --prefix backend && npm run test:security --prefix frontend && npm run test:security --prefix e2e
scripts.test:fuzz: npm run test:fuzz --prefix backend && npm run test:fuzz:extended --prefix backend
scripts.test:all: npm run lint && npm run test:coverage && npm run test:security && npm run test:performance && npm run test:fuzz
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix backend && npm run lint:fix --prefix frontend
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix backend && npm run format --prefix frontend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --prefix backend && npm run format:check --prefix frontend
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && npm audit --prefix backend && npm audit --prefix frontend
scripts.security:fix: npm audit fix && npm audit fix --prefix backend && npm audit fix --prefix frontend
scripts.quality:check: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test:coverage
